metadata.title: CVE-2023-47430 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Stack-buffer-overflow vulnerability in ReadyMedia (MiniDLNA) v1.3.3 allowsattackers to cause a denial of service via via the SendContainer() functionat tivo_commands.c.

criterions.comment: minidlna package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
